title: The most simple way to create a thread is by calling a selector “in the background”. This means a new thread is created to execute the selector. The receiving object can be any object, not just
self
c
, but it needs to respond to the given selector.

inline_content.Text: The most simple way to create a thread is by calling a selector “in the background”. This means a new thread is created to execute the selector. The receiving object can be any object, not just
, but it needs to respond to the given selector.
